decision_conditions: Condition : 0 - Reason for refusal in respect of advertisement (a)  The banner signs are considered to be unsuitable in the interests of amenity in the light of the general characteristics of the locality in that they occupy a dominating position on the building with a long range of visibility and are out of keeping with the appearance of the building and the street scene at this point creating and undesirable precedent.  Conditions in respect of consent for Advertisement (b)
Condition : 1 - The trees shown on the deposited plan as to be retained shall be retained and maintained to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 2 - Any tree shown for retention, which is identified as being dead, dying, dangerous or mutilated, within three years from the completion of building works, thereby needing to be removed, shall be replaced by a semi-mature or mature tree of the same species or a tree of height, girth and species to be agreed with the Local Planning Authority. The replanting shall take place in the first available planting season.  Reason for condition: To preserve and maintain the visual amenities and character of the locality.

Condition : 3 - All new tree, shrub and ground cover planting shall be carried out during the first planting season after the completion of building operations on the site or within such longer period as may be agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority, and such planting shall be maintained, including the replacement of dead, dying or defective plants and trees, to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority for a period of three years unless otherwise agreed.  Reason for condition: To preserve and maintain the visual amenities and character of the locality.
Condition : 4 - The period of this consent shall expire 5 years from the date of this notice.
description: DISPLAY OF (A) TWO EXTERNALLY ILLUMINATED BANNER SIGNS AT FIRST AND SECOND FLOOR LEVELS AND (B) AN EXTERNALLY ILLUMINATED FASCIA SIGN.
